Selfe deniall: or, A Christians hardest taske. Written by Christopher Wilson; preacher of the Word of God, &c. Wilson, Christopher, 1579 or 80-1624.
[20], 65, [1] p.
Printed by Nicholas Okes, for Richard Whitakers, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Kings Head, London : 1625.
Running title reads: Selfe-deniall. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery. Page numbers written over in ink.
